body_html:
Hi, @martinwicke. Thank you for restarting tests. Sorry for bothering, but I still can't fully reproduce CI build.

I see that during the last run only one required test failed (one pylint check to be precise). I have just fixed it, so could you please restart tests again?

And one more question. Should only required tests be green or all? I see that a lot of "none-required" tests fail in absolutely another modules with timeout and other types of exceptions, so I don't feel like I can fix them.

body:
Hi, @martinwicke. Thank you for restarting tests. Sorry for bothering, but I still can't fully reproduce CI build.

I see that during the last run only one required test failed (one `pylint` check to be precise). I have just fixed it, so could you please restart tests again?

And one more question. Should only `required` tests be green or all? I see that a lot of "none-required" tests fail in absolutely another modules with timeout and other types of exceptions, so I don't feel like I can fix them.
